contextId.information: This represents all the good things that God gives us. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
This represents all the bad things that God makes or allows us to experience. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
Here "the one who was poor" refers to any poor person. AT: "I used to rescue poor people who cried out" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
contextId.quote: I rescued the one who was poor when he cried out

contextId.information: This represents anyone who was about to die. AT: "those who were about to die" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
contextId.quote: him who was about to perish
